project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game. Questions and answers should be stored in a variable inside the code.

task.name: Design the question structure and store questions and answers in a variable
Implement the main game loop to handle user input and score tracking
Implement functionality to display the user's score at the end of the game
Write tests to ensure the game logic works correctly
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure all components function as expected
